thread.title: 2017 Nissan Titan struggles in latest crash test
thread.title_full: 2017 Nissan Titan struggles in latest crash test

author: Andrew Ganz (feedback@highgearmedia.com)
title: 2017 Nissan Titan struggles in latest crash test
text: Bigger isn't always better. Case in point: the 2017 Nissan Titan, which the IIHS says struggled in the agency's demanding small overlap frontal crash test. In the test, which is designed to replicate a vehicle hitting a utility pole or a tree, the Titan earned a "Marginal," the lowest of four available scores. It does not qualify for the IIHS' Top...
